name: Dlb activity log
tagline: A data tracking tool for incoming data into the Data Linkage Branch of Western Australia
body:
### Purpose
Currently the activity log is under development. The aim is to create something to keep track of and manager incoming data 
received by the Data Linkage Branch of Western Australia. 

### Tools
A number of open source tools and technologies have been used to create the activity log.
These include:
* Django
* BootStrap/Django Bootstrap
* jQuery
* pip
* ...
For a full list see requirments

### Development & License
The development of this application is under the GNU v3 License. You may do what you want with the code.
However this is my first time developing a web application and I am merely a lowly part-time developer, part-time student and
part-time data linker so be warey of bugs in the code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
